title: Here’s everything we expect from Apple’s Peek Performance event next week
content:
Apple has finally announced the date of its next virtual event. Next Tuesday, the company will be broadcasting a live stream for all users around the world to watch. Titled Peek Performance, we’re expecting this Spring event to introduce several new products from the company. Apart from the rumored devices, we’re confident that the Cupertino

The post Here’s everything we expect from Apple’s Peek Performance event next week appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple's Peek Performance event is less than one week away. Here's everything we expect to see from this virtual Spring event.
